    public interface WorkItem
extends com.guidewire.pl.domain.workqueue.gen.WorkItemStubI
    Superinterface for all distributed work queue workitems.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(java.util.Date now)
        Initialize a work item. Call this method after setting all other fields on the work item. The method sets work item creation time, last update time, and processing time according to work item priority.
        Parameters:
        now - Current time (used to update LastUpdateTime timestamp).

      • checkOut

        void checkOut(java.util.Date checkoutTime,
            int instanceNumber,
            long progressInterval)
        Check out a work item. The progressInterval is used to calculate the AvailableSince date to set (checkoutTime + 2 * progressInterval). The AvailableSince date is used to find orphans.
        Parameters:
        checkoutTime - The time of check out
        instanceNumber - The instance number of the worker doing the check out
        progressInterval - progress interval

      • checkIn

        void checkIn(java.util.Date availableSince,
           java.util.Date now)
        Postpone work item for later retrial
        Parameters:
        availableSince - The time to retry work item
        now - Current time (used to update LastUpdateTime timestamp).

      • fail

        void fail(java.util.Date failDate,
        java.lang.String exception)
        Fail work item
        Parameters:
        failDate - The time of failure
        exception - optional exception string. If null exception field on the work item is not modified (current value will be preserved).

      • getProcessHistory

        ProcessHistory getProcessHistory()
        Return ProcessHistory that may be null
        Returns:
        ProcessHistory that may be null

      • getNumRetries

        java.lang.Integer getNumRetries()
        Return that number of retries, i.e. Attempts - 1. Added for backward compatibility.
        Returns:
        number of retries of the work item.

      • getAvailableSinceAsLong

        java.lang.Long getAvailableSinceAsLong()
        Return AvailableSince as Long value. May be null
        Returns:
        AvailableSince as Long value

      • getAvailableSinceAsDate

        java.util.Date getAvailableSinceAsDate()
        Return AvailableSince as Date value. May be null
        Returns:
        AvailableSince as Date value

      • setAvailableSinceAsLong

        void setAvailableSinceAsLong(java.lang.Long val)
        Sets AvailableSince.
        Parameters:
        val - AvailableSince. May be null
